contentList.content: Condense all cloud surfaces in the area. Deal [1] and inflict Deaf and Bleeding for 2 turns.
Increase Constitution by [1] and Water Resistance by [2] for all allied characters in the radius.
High-kick the target to push it 8m away, dealing [1] and set Knocked Down.
Strike the target with your head, dealing [1] damage and set Knocked Down.

Metal pieces start to heat, increasing Fire resistance by [1], reducing Water resistance by [2], Physical and Piercing resistances by [3] and reflect 50% of the melee damage as Fire damage. Also grants immunity to Burning, set Burning on contact and give weapon-based attack a Fire damage bonus.
Attacking a character with Bleeding will recover 1 AP. Can happen only once per turn.
Throw a piece of brain to the target, dealing [1] and set Diseased for 2 turns.
Hit the target 5 times, dealing [1] each hit.
Rush with your shield, dealing [1], pushing the enemies on the path and set Slowed for 1 turn.
Split the guardian armour into 4 parts : Torso, Arms, Feet and Sword

Metal pieces start to heat, increasing Fire resistance by [1], reducing Water resistance by [2], Physical and Piercing resistances by [3] and reflect 50% of the melee damage as Fire damage. Also grants immunity to Burning, set Burning on contact and give weapon-based attack a Fire damage bonus.
Water swipes treatrously the targets feet, dealing [1] and set Knocked Down for 1 turn. Can only target Wet character or on water surfaces.
